statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Professor Doge is now working on a project using polynomial for some mathematical calculations. In his project, he wants to approximate the exponential function ex with a polynomial whose degree does not exceed n. As one of professor’s assistants, you are asked to find a polynomial f (x) with degree n that minimizes

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
There are several test cases, please process till EOF.
Each test case consists of only one integer denoting the degree n of the polynomial (0 ≤ n ≤ 10).

statement.title: Output
statement.content:
For each test case, print n + 1 lines.
for the i-th line, print one floating number ai denoting the coefficient in the term xi, i = 0, 1, . . . , n.
It is guaranteed that the answer is always unique. Any answer within an absolute error less than or equal to 10-50 would be accepted.
